changeSet.author: niis

column.name: id
column.remarks: Primary key for the device entry.

column.name: external_id
column.remarks: Identifier used to refer to this device in APIs.

column.name: type
column.remarks: Pointer to the device type configuration.

column.name: friendly_name
column.remarks: Name that is displayed in UI.

column.name: serial_no
column.remarks: Id of the token (serial number).

column.name: label
column.remarks: Id of the slot (label).

column.name: pin
column.remarks: Hash of the PIN code used to access the token.

column.name: id
column.remarks: Primary key for the key entry.

column.name: external_id
column.remarks: Unique identifier for the key.

column.name: token_id
column.remarks: Foreign key referencing the keyconf_devices table.

column.name: type
column.remarks: Type of the key.

column.name: friendly_name
column.remarks: Name that is displayed in UI.

column.name: label
column.remarks: Label of the key.

column.name: public_key
column.remarks: Base64 encoded public key corresponding to the private key.

column.name: keystore
column.remarks: Encrypted PKCS#12 key store.

column.name: sign_mechanism_name
column.remarks: Signing (PKCS#11) mechanism name.

column.name: usage
column.remarks: Usage type of the key (e.g., SIGNING, AUTHENTICATION).

column.name: id
column.remarks: Primary key for the certificate entry.

column.name: external_id
column.remarks: Identifier for the certificate.

column.name: key_id
column.remarks: Foreign key referencing the keyconf_keys table.

column.name: member_id
column.remarks: Foreign key referencing the identifier table (ClientIdEntity).

column.name: data
column.remarks: Raw certificate data.

column.name: status
column.remarks: Current status of the certificate (e.g., SAVED, REGISTERED).

column.name: active
column.remarks: Whether this certificate can be used by the proxy.

column.name: next_renewal_time
column.remarks: Recommended time by the CA for renewing the certificate.

column.name: renewed_cert_hash
column.remarks: Hash of newer cert version in registration process.

column.name: renewal_error
column.remarks: Error message from automatic renewal process.

column.name: ocsp_verify_error
column.remarks: Error message from OCSP verification before activation.

column.name: id
column.remarks: Primary key for the certificate request entry.

column.name: external_id
column.remarks: Identifier for the certificate request.

column.name: key_id
column.remarks: Foreign key referencing the keyconf_keys table.

column.name: member_id
column.remarks: Foreign key referencing the identifier table (ClientIdEntity).

column.name: subject_name
column.remarks: Distinguished Name (DN) used in the CSR.

column.name: subject_alternative_name
column.remarks: Subject Alternative Name (SAN) extension used in the CSR.

column.name: certificate_profile
column.remarks: Fully qualified class name of the certificate profile used.
